TopicTitle: What's wrong with KIS or KAS?

Articles.Content: I can't use any of details like wrench or screwdriver. And also when I trying to connect nodes for rigid strut the game freezes. Only I have these problems or you too?

5 hours ago, CrazyGreenPilot_RUS said:

I can't use any of details like wrench or screwdriver. And also when I trying to connect nodes for rigid strut the game freezes. Only I have these problems or you too?

Nope everything works like it should for me. 90% of the time this is an installation problem either you installed things in the wrong place or don't have Module Manager. https://github.com/ihsoft/KIS/wiki/Troubleshooting

If you want help you need to post logs. I prefer the KSP.Log in the game's install directory.
